name: Extraordinary World! I, a vampire...
author: Yuewen Manhua &#40阅文漫画&#41
content: Ten years ago, when faced with an alien civilization&#039s invasion, Earth&#039s &quotExtraordinary&quot ability users not only stood up to fight back, but also transferred their powers into &quotability books&quot for ordinary people to learn. After humanity joined forces to repel the alien invaders, Earth had already become a world where only &quotability users&quot reign supreme.Today, Quinn—whose parents died in battle and who has no money to buy an &quotability book&quot—steps through the g
